abstract: Over the weekend, Governor Brown signed a law that will help illegal immigrants pay for college, and he also rejected affirmative action in admissions.
snippet: Over the weekend, Governor Brown signed a law that will help illegal immigrants pay for college, and he also rejected affirmative action in admissions.
lead_paragraph: In California, illegal immigrants enrolling in college will be eligible for state scholarships and financial aid beginning next July.

headline.main: Dream Act Becomes Law in California
